highlights: Record data center revenue led by HGX/H100 and inference demand
New inference platforms (L4, L40, H100 NVL, Grace Hopper Superchip) launched

notes: Launches: GeForce RTX 40 Series laptops, RTX 4070, RTX 4060 family, expanded DLSS and GeForce NOW lineup
NVIDIA Omniverse Cloud for Azure, new Ada RTX GPU releases
Drive Orin ramp, $14B design win pipeline, BYD continues partnership

capital_expenditure.context: PP&E and intangible investments supporting AI infrastructure

capital_return.note: Returned $99M via dividends; share repurchases opportunistic

software: AI Foundations, NeMo, Omniverse Cloud and AI Enterprise continue to expand developer adoption
DGX Cloud launched via Azure, GCP, Oracle partnership
networking: Quantum-2 InfiniBand momentum with 400G platform; BlueField-3 in production for CSPs
Spectrum-X Ethernet previewed for AI workloads, focus on AI optimization

metadata.source: NVDA Q1 FY2024 press release and earnings call transcript
